verbs.description: The NFL [V: wo] n't let players kneel during the national anthem , a win for President Trump and conservatives , but perhaps a loss for the league .
[ARG0: The NFL] [ARGM-MOD: wo] [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: let] [ARG1: players kneel during the national anthem , a win for President Trump and conservatives , but perhaps a loss for the league] .
